doc.title: Dokosvane
doc.plot: Professor Pavlov has to postpone his psychotherapy sessions for the rest of the week because the repairs at his neighbors produce unbearable noise. The possibility of session delay upsets his young patient Elizaveta, who has recently lost her grandma. She has something very important to share. Exhausted by the repairs and the immature relations with his mother, the professor accepts the challenge to take a trip with Lisa to her grandma's village. This adventure is in fact a session for two. The professor finds the strength to set his face against his dominating and overprotective mother. Lisa shakes off the grief of the terrible loss. However, could be a session for two successful?
